problem.markdown:
For a given state of water, the value of enthalpy for saturated liquid is equal to the value of enthalpy for saturated vapour. The given state lies on
( ) L-V saturation Line (x) Critical point ( ) Triple Point ( ) Cannot be determined
problem.p: For a given state of water, the value of enthalpy for saturated liquid is equal to the value of enthalpy for saturated vapour. The given state lies on
